channel.title: Abouts on My Wild Diary
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on My Wild Diary

item.title: About This Site
item.description:
Hi there! I’m a keen naturalist and wildlife photographer.

This blog is my visual journal â€“ a place to share moments captured through my lens and to keep a long-term record of my photographic journey.

My main motivation for starting it was frustration with the ever-changing policies of online photo platforms (looking at you, Flickr and Google Photos!). I wanted a more reliable way to preserve my favorite images online.
